Name: Honey & Marmalade Dram
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This citrusy drink seems to enrich and enhance the flavour of Scotch.
History: Recipe adapted from the Honeysuckle Daiquiri .
Nutrition: One serving of Honey & Marmalade Dram contains 157 calories
